name: negotiations
commands: Welcome! Welcome!|If it isn't the lovely Lady Schuri.|If I recall...|Ah yes! You were going to be engaged to my dear son. Alas...
You never told me your were engaged
Yes, it was a shame really.|The two of you would have made a lovely couple.|But!
What happened?! Lady Schuri, why are you around such riff raff|It's befitting for someone of your status to hang around such lowly...|peasants.
Heh, that's one way to put it
But I do suppose you're here for something...|I am rather amiable to discussion...|as long as THOSE two are out of my sight.
Of course, Lord Seth. I'm currently seeking a relic and heard through the grapevine that it is in your possession.
This map is currently broken because of a bug, you will be skipped ahead to the next chapter
source:
remove_all_units
transition;close
#if chose negotiations
music;negotiations
add_unit;MC;;immediate
add_unit;Senya;;immediate
add_unit;Schuri;;immediate
add_unit;Seth;;immediate
multi_add_portrait;MC;FarLeft;Schuri;MidLeft;Senya;Left;Seth;FarRight
change_background;Bedroom
speak;Seth;Welcome! Welcome!|If it isn't the lovely Lady Schuri.|If I recall...|Ah yes! You were going to be engaged to my dear son. Alas...
speak;Senya;Engaged?
speak;Senya;You never told me your were engaged
speak;Schuri;Ah..well-
speak;Seth;Yes, it was a shame really.|The two of you would have made a lovely couple.|But!
move_portrait;Seth;Right
speak;Seth;What happened?! Lady Schuri, why are you around such riff raff|It's befitting for someone of your status to hang around such lowly...|peasants.
mirror_portrait;Senya
speak;Senya;Can you believe this guy?
speak;MC;He's rather...eccentric
speak;Senya;Heh, that's one way to put it
mirror_portrait;Senya
speak;Seth;But I do suppose you're here for something...|I am rather amiable to discussion...|as long as THOSE two are out of my sight.
speak;Schuri;Of course, Lord Seth. I'm currently seeking a relic and heard through the grapevine that it is in your possession.
speak;;This map is currently broken because of a bug, you will be skipped ahead to the next chapter
win_game
